item.title: 355 – Statue
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Statue When blind Michelangelo carved at last the air from David’s empty hand curled at his side, he sensed the end. Set down the blunted bit and mallet. Breathed the dust of him for days, known intimate, marbled on the inside. Begotten, not; made. One man to stand … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Statue

When blind Michelangelo carved at last the air from David’s empty hand curled at his side, he sensed the end. Set down the blunted bit and mallet. Breathed the dust of him for days, known intimate, marbled on the inside. Begotten, not; made. One man to stand and crack with the ages, one a stone, softening in its socket.

item.title: 354 – Warble
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Warble In the bleak midwinter rain we stopped along the cedar’d path to listen. The moss grew quiet on the bark of the evergreens. The nuthatches, juncos, jays you said you new by sound were silent. You breathed in Latin vapor–Parulidae, Sitta, … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Warble

In the bleak midwinter rain
we stopped along the cedar’d path
to listen. The moss grew quiet
on the bark of the evergreens.
The nuthatches, juncos, jays
you said you new by sound
were silent. You breathed
in Latin vapor–Parulidae, Sitta, Sturnella
–hoping to coax forth a fluted call
from some warbled throat. We waited
with chill hands, searching
for a song we could not hear,
that would not come yet
to human ears.

item.title: 353 – Advent (vii)
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Advent (vii) Joy is late-night wine laid out on the couch by Bach’s sonatas talking with kin chosen of kin born of woman man man made alive by love and science advent of a new king -dom come on earth as it is … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Advent (vii)

Joy is late-night wine
laid out on the couch
by Bach’s sonatas
talking with kin chosen
of kin born of woman
man man made alive
by love and science
advent of a new king
-dom come on earth
as it is in heaven

item.title: 352 – Advent (vi)
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Advent (vi) God come down Meet us here In whatever dark We find ourselves Our wicks bent Our matches wet We have no sense Of dawn God come down In quiet light Or glory blazing Meet us So we might see … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Advent (vi)

God come down
Meet us here
In whatever dark
We find ourselves

Our wicks bent
Our matches wet
We have no sense
Of dawn

God come down
In quiet light
Or glory blazing
Meet us

So we might see
And know You
Are come alive
Alight

item.title: 351 – Blessing (Snowflake)
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Blessing (Snowflake) know the slow burn crystalline on your tongue    ecstatic empty world filling slowly with silence    electric sizzle of circuitry    lace-like never to return    evaporated from the back of your hand in waves steaming ghost released into … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Blessing (Snowflake)

know the slow burn
crystalline on your tongue    ecstatic

empty world filling
slowly with silence    electric

sizzle
of circuitry    lace-like

never to return    evaporated

from the back of your hand
in waves

steaming ghost
released into the    ether

cloud bank come down     settle
in the low-land

of your throat

item.title: 350 – Advent (v)
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Advent (v) hateful Advent full of pregnant waiting unsubstantiated claims of future coming kings as kings we want not babes becoming we love living now invent our modus operandi handmade golden bulls towers babbling down interconnected web we weave undaunted by … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Advent (v)

hateful Advent full
of pregnant waiting
unsubstantiated claims of future
coming kings as kings
we want not babes becoming
we love living now invent
our modus operandi
handmade golden bulls towers
babbling down interconnected web
we weave undaunted by what we can’t
wait on. appearing eastern stars? we go
seek them out. birth? not even. now
o come o come Emmanuel
by c-section, stat, sent home
we’re tired of your holy game
of wait and see of abide
in me and love of me
of wait and see what comes

item.title: 349 – Whittle
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Whittle you wait patiently to unfurl for me the dream you had more inspired than this trinket I’m bent on carving just now scattering shavings all over the bed whittling down this small bird that was a horse only a few … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Whittle

you wait patiently
to unfurl for me
the dream you had
more inspired
than this trinket
I’m bent on
carving just now
scattering shavings
all over the bed
whittling down
this small bird
that was a horse
only a few strokes ago
and soon will be
the thumb I’ve cut
bleeding if I keep on
going leaving
your dream
and its reality
for the top sheet
quickly staining
soaking up blood
and words of sudden
surprise

item.title: 347 – Advent (iii)
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Advent (iii) we three kings saw such a one irrational light some star Eastern shine down seen from afar o come o come ye magi gift-givers sage-seekers on bended knee find at manger’s gate a gift of god come down … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Advent (iii)

we three kings saw

such a one irrational

light some star Eastern

shine down seen from afar

o come o come ye magi

gift-givers sage-seekers

on bended knee find

at manger’s gate a gift

of god come down

incarnate simple cherub

we come so far we kings

to find the star alighted

on the earth the shining

come down amidst the ox

and ass feeding the bleating

groan of yoke of sword of fear

held high over all the earth

awaiting some prince

some irreverent unlooked for

king this the babe this christ

we saw we three we wise

men upon the earth

compelled to give of our gold

our frankincense and myrrh

to bow and sing in praise

coming of the star

item.title: 346 – Heroine Haiku
item.dc:creator: Graham
item.description: Heroine Haiku Tough chicks on wheels Slam bash bang crash score points Real role models
item.content:encoded:
Heroine Haiku

Tough chicks on wheels
Slam bash bang crash score points
Real role models
